hero.title: We design and build
hero.sub: A consulting and development company with a proprietary AI stack and banking sector expertise. Market research, product development, technical documentation — from idea to implementation.
home.sh.d: Combining enterprise architecture expertise with a modern AI stack
home.f1.d: RAG system, LLM orchestration, semantic search — our own automation platform, independent of third-party solutions
home.f2.d: Experience designing systems at the largest financial institutions serving millions of users
home.f3.d: From market research and strategy to product development and production launch
home.f4.d: Fintech-grade infrastructure. Encryption, VPN tunnels, Zero-Knowledge Architecture
home.f5.d: Project and technical documentation per GOST and international standards IEEE, ISO
home.f6.d: A compact team with automated processes. Faster than an agency, deeper than a freelancer
svc.sh.d: Consulting, development, documentation — a full cycle from idea to result
svc.r.d: In-depth market, competitor, and target audience analysis powered by AI tools for processing large data sets.
svc.s.d: Marketing strategy development with sales funnel, content plan, and financial projections.
svc.a.d: Setup and management of advertising campaigns on Yandex Direct, targeted ads on social media, and display advertising.
svc.w.d: Design and development of web applications from landing pages to enterprise SaaS platforms. Modern stack, responsive design, high performance.
svc.m.d: Cross-platform and native mobile app development for iOS and Android.
svc.m.i4: Publishing to App Store and Google Play
svc.pd.d: The foundation of any project. From concept and scope to detailed requirements and user scenarios.
svc.td.d: Architecture, API, databases, work plans. Everything a development team needs to work efficiently.
svc.td.i5: QA: Test Plan, Test Cases, Bug Reports
svc.why.d: We don't just complete tasks — we engineer solutions as a system where every element is interconnected and addresses a specific business challenge.
svc.why.i1: Experience at the largest banks — fintech-grade quality standards
svc.why.i2: Proprietary AI stack — speed without sacrificing depth
svc.why.i3: Compliance with GOST and international standards
svc.why.i5: Full cycle — from idea to final result
stu.sh.d: From topic selection to successful defense. Confidential and on time
stu.hero.d: You are not alone — thousands of students go through this every semester. We know what you're facing, and we know how to help.
stu.p1.d: You wrote your paper, but the system shows 15%. Sound familiar? We'll help prepare material that passes on the first try
stu.p2.t: The professor keeps sending it back
stu.p2.d: Endless comments, revisions, new requirements. We account for your university's guidelines and your advisor's requirements
stu.p3.d: Work, family, other courses — and the deadline is in a week. We'll help you sort it out so you can focus on what matters more
stu.p4.t: Afraid I won't pass the defense
stu.p4.d: We support you all the way to your defense. Free revisions based on feedback. We don't abandon you after the consultation ends
stu.p5.d: GOST, university guidelines, plagiarism checker, formatting — we handle all the details for you
stu.p6.d: Complete anonymity. No names, no traces. Your security is our priority
stu.k1.d: Assistance with preparing essays, reports, tests, and presentations
stu.k2.d: Assistance with term papers in any field. We follow your university's guidelines and professor's requirements
stu.k3.d: Full support — from topic selection to defense preparation. Presentation and speech included as a bonus
stu.k4.d: In-depth work for master's students. Up-to-date sources, scientific novelty, complete formatting
stu.k5.d: Assistance with preparing articles for VAK and RINC (Russian academic databases). Journal selection and formatting per requirements
stu.k6.d: Already wrote your paper but the plagiarism checker won't pass it? We'll help improve originality without losing meaning
stu.incl.i3: Formatting per GOST and your university's requirements
tech.sh.d: In-house development combining the best tools into a unified ecosystem
tech.c1.d: Cutting-edge open-source models for routine tasks. The most powerful commercial models for strategic planning, deep analysis, and scientific synthesis
tech.c2.d: Retrieval-Augmented Generation on our own knowledge base. Obsidian as a graph store with cross-linked thousands of scientific sources and methodologies
tech.c3.d: Semantic search across document corpora via vector embeddings. Instant retrieval of relevant sources from millions of fragments
tech.c4.d: Enterprise-grade backend on NestJS with TypeScript. PostgreSQL for relational data, Vector DB for semantic queries, Redis 7 for caching
tech.c5.d: Lightning-fast full-text search via Meilisearch. S3-compatible object storage MinIO for secure document storage
tech.c6.d: Communication between specialists via peer-to-peer protocol with end-to-end encryption. No intermediary servers. Your data never leaves the secure perimeter
tech.arch.d: We don't use off-the-shelf platforms. Our team designed and built the system from scratch, combining the best technology stack of 2026 into a single software suite. Every component is selected and integrated for maximum performance and security.
tech.sec.d: Infrastructure built to banking security standards. All traffic passes through encrypted VPN tunnels. Node-to-node communications are protected by enterprise-grade protocols ensuring maximum data protection.
inv.sh.d: Proven technology, growing market, ambitious plans
inv.hero.t: From Educational Consulting to International Markets
inv.hero.d: Logic Architecture is more than a service. It's a technology platform with a proprietary AI stack, ready to scale into adjacent markets: technical documentation, international accelerator applications, and proprietary IT product development.
inv.c1.d: We are planning to enter the professional documentation market for international accelerator and grant program applications. Our technology enables us to produce documentation at a level accepted by leading funds.
inv.c2.d: We are developing a line of SaaS products based on our AI stack: from document workflow automation to intelligent business analytics systems. Each product is a separate monetization unit.
inv.c3.i1: AI/ML engineers to advance the RAG system
abt.sh.d: From a banking career to a global decentralized community of scientists and developers
abt.name: Founder & Architect
abt.role: Ex-Head of Systems Analysis · Largest banks in Russia
abt.bio: Built a distinguished career at two of the country's largest banks, managing systems processing trillions. Led systems analysis departments, designed the architecture of mission-critical financial platforms. But corporate bureaucracy left no room for true innovation.
abt.tl1.d: Years at the country's largest financial institutions. Leading systems analysis, designing platform architectures serving millions of users. Experience where the cost of an error is measured in billions.
abt.tl2.d: Extensive research and participation in open-source projects on GitHub and Hugging Face. Studying cutting-edge machine learning models, experimenting with RAG architectures and LLM orchestration.
abt.tl3.d: Traveled the world with a focus on Southeast Asia — the modern hub of independent developers and digital nomads. Gained invaluable experience connecting with leading international professionals from diverse countries.
abt.tl4.d: Created his own projects combining banking experience, AI expertise, and international connections. The greatest passion — helping people, relieving unnecessary pain and problems, making their lives simpler and better.
abt.dao.sub: A new type of structure distributed around the world
abt.dao.d: Today Logic Architecture is a decentralized organization operating on DAO principles. We unite scientists, researchers, and developers from around the world into a single network whose goal is advancing science and technology, making them truly accessible to everyone.
abt.dao.c1: Members work from all over the world. No central office, no corporate hierarchy — just shared goals and horizontal connections between professionals.
abt.dao.c2: Maximum anonymity and security for every member. End-to-end encryption, P2P communications, no real data in the open.
abt.dao.c3: Members contribute to ongoing projects according to their skills and interests: from scientific research to infrastructure development.
abt.dao.c4: We're not just looking for senior developers and PhDs — we invite anyone who shares our goals and ideas. Motivation matters, not formal credentials.
abt.quote: I created Logic Architecture not for profit, but for an idea: that cutting-edge technology should work for people, not against them. Every person deserves tools that were previously available only to corporations.
join.sh.t: Become Part of a Global Network
join.sh.d: We attract scientists and developers from diverse fields for the joint advancement of science and technology
join.hero.d: Logic Architecture brings together people from different countries and disciplines. We have no formal barriers: it doesn't matter if you're a PhD researcher, a junior developer, or a student with a burning passion. If our goals resonate with you — you're already one of us.
join.r1.d: Specialists in any scientific field: from humanities to technical disciplines. Assistance with methodology, peer review, and scientific synthesis
join.r2.d: Backend, Frontend, AI/ML, DevOps — any stack and level. Work on real products with a cutting-edge technology stack
join.r3.d: You don't have to be an expert. If you share the ideas of open science and accessible technology — there's a task that matches your skills and interests
join.v1.t: Work From Anywhere in the World
join.v1.d: Fully distributed structure. Time zones and geography don't matter
join.v2.d: End-to-end encryption, no real names. Your security is guaranteed
join.v3.d: Work with cutting-edge technologies and connect with international specialists
join.v4.d: No bosses and subordinates — just colleagues with shared goals and mutual respect
join.form.d: Fill out the form — we'll contact you through a secure channel
join.form.ph1: Who you are, what you do, what motivates you...
join.form.ph2: Your professional experience, technologies, scientific fields...
join.form.ph3: What are you into outside of work? This helps us understand you as a person...
join.form.ph4: Telegram, email, or any preferred messenger...
join.form.alt: or message us directly: @LogicArchitecture
footer.copy:
© 2026 Logic Architecture. Consulting · Development · Documentation
Telegram · Confidential · All rights reserved
footer.disc: Materials provided by Logic Architecture as part of educational services are supplementary in nature and are intended to assist in the preparation of academic papers.
modal.d: Message us on Telegram — describe your task in as much detail as possible so we can provide a quality consultation:
toast.ratelimit: Please wait a minute before resubmitting
toast.success: Request sent! We'll contact you through a secure channel
toast.error: Sending failed. Please message us directly on Telegram
